To uppercase and lowercase C/C++ functions for Unicode - language agnostic

From http://publib.boulder.ibm.com/infocenter/iseries/v7r1m0/index.jsp?topic=%2Fnls%2Frbagslowtoupmaptable.htm

**	Copyright (c) Leigh Brasington 2012.  All rights reserved.

**	To uppercase and lowercase functions for Unicode - language agnostic
**
**	Keywords: unicode toupper tolower C/C++
**
**	The tables were constructed from
**	http://publib.boulder.ibm.com/infocenter/iseries/v7r1m0/index.jsp?topic=%2Fnls%2Frbagslowtoupmaptable.htm
**
**	To use: call the functions at the end of this file. Use at your own risk!
*/

	(short)0x24CF, (short)0xFF21, (short)0xFF22, (short)0xFF23, (short)0xFF24, (short)0xFF25, (short)0xFF26, (short)0xFF27, (short)0xFF28, 
	(short)0xFF29, (short)0xFF2A, (short)0xFF2B, (short)0xFF2C, (short)0xFF2D, (short)0xFF2E, (short)0xFF2F, (short)0xFF30, (short)0xFF31, 
	(short)0xFF32, (short)0xFF33, (short)0xFF34, (short)0xFF35, (short)0xFF36, (short)0xFF37, (short)0xFF38, (short)0xFF39, (short)0xFF3A, 
	(short)0x0000 };

short
tolowerUnic(short c)
{
	short *	p;

	if ((p = wcschr(uppers, c)) != NULL)
		return *(lowers + (p - uppers));
	return c;
}

short
toupperUnic(short c)
{
	short *	p;

	if ((p = wcschr(lowers, c)) != NULL)
		return *(uppers + (p - lowers));
	return c;
}

void
tolowerUnicStr(short *p)
{
	while (*p)
		*p++ = tolowerUnic(*p);
}

void
toupperUnicStr(short *p)
{
	while (*p)
		*p++ = toupperUnic(*p);
}
